items.sentence: Do you think you could persuade Tom to help us?
Do you think you could take this inside for me?
How long does it usually take you to walk home?
When was the last time that you used a compass?
When was the last time that you went to Boston?
Where do you see yourself three years from now?
Tom gets jealous when Mary talks to other guys.
I haven\'t had anything to eat since breakfast.
How could I know that that was going to happen?
I asked Tom if he\'d like to do that with Mary.
I heard that Tom has spoken to Mary about that.
I hope Tom remembers where he buried the money.
It\'s only about a three-minute walk from here.
It\'s quite clear that Tom is going to be late.
Tom built his house out of shipping containers.
Tom walked down Park Street past Mary\'s house.
Tom wanted me to tell you he can\'t come today.
I wonder whether or not it\'ll be hot tomorrow.
We might stay in Boston for another three days.
Tom was willing to give up everything for Mary.
